title: Fig rolls
ingredients: ['115 g (4 oz) plain white flour', '115 g (4 oz) plain wholemeal flour', '150 g (5½ oz) unsalted butter, cut into small pieces', '65 g (2¼ oz) light muscovado sugar', '1 tsp pure vanilla extract', '2 egg yolks', '250 g (8½ oz) ready-to-eat dried figs, finely chopped', '2 tbsp lemon juice']
